actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to limit the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court and of the district courts in certain cases.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Eliminates Supreme Court and Federal district court jurisdiction to review or hear any case arising out of State law or any Act interpreting a State statute relating to abortion.

titles.title: A bill to limit the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court and of the district courts in certain cases.
